| HistoryText             = The '''House of Lor'''{{r|All-New, All-Different Marvel Universe Vol 1 1|; [[Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)|Inhumans]]'s entry}} was one of the [[Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)|Inhuman]] Royal Families of [[Attilan]].{{r|New Avengers Vol 3 10}}

When [[Randac (Earth-616)|Randac]] found the [[Terrigen]], underwent [[Terrigenesis]] and proposed for all to do as well, the Royal Families of Attilan divided themselves.{{r|New Avengers Vol 3 10}}

The House of Lor traveled the world, and eventually created the city of [[Orollan]] in [[Greenland]],{{r|New Avengers Vol 3 10}} its inhabitants known as the [[Lor Tribe (Earth-616)|Lor]].{{r|All-New, All-Different Marvel Universe Vol 1 1|; [[Lash (Earth-616)|Lash]]'s entry}}
